AppContainer.EditHeader.discardCancel.description: Button on dialog to keep editing (cancelling close action)

AppContainer.EditHeader.discardContent.description: Button on dialog to close without saving

AppContainer.EditHeader.discardTitle.description: Title of dialog that shows when closing an observation without saving

screens.GpsModal.details.description: Section title for details about current position

screens.GpsModal.lastUpdate.description: Section title for time of last GPS update

screens.GpsModal.locationSensors.description: Heading for section about location sensor status

screens.GpsModal.no.description: if a location sensor is active yes/no

screens.GpsModal.yes.description: if a location sensor is active yes/no

screens.Observation.ObservationView.noAn.description: Placeholder text for fields on an observation which are not answered

screens.Observation.ObservationView.obse.description: Default name of observation with no matching preset

screens.Observation.cancel.description: Button to cancel delete of observation

screens.Observation.confirm.description: Button to confirm delete of observation

screens.Observation.deleteTitle.description: Title of dialog asking confirmation to delete an observation

screens.Observation.notFound.description: Message shown when an observation is not found

screens.ObservationDetails.QuestionNavBa.description: Indicates which question we are on and total questions

screens.ObservationDetails.done.description: Button text when all questions are complete

screens.ObservationDetails.nextQuestion.description: Button text to navigate to next question

screens.ObservationDetails.title.description: Title of observation details screen showing question number and total

screens.ObservationEdit.BottomSheet.addL.description: Label above keyboard that expands into bottom sheet of options to add (photo, details etc)

screens.ObservationEdit.ObservationEditV.description: Button to change a category / preset
Name of observation when no preset matches
Shown in new observation screen whilst looking for GPS

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.keepW.description: Button to cancel save and continue waiting for GPS

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.manua.description: Button to manually enter GPS coordinates

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.noGps.description: Description in dialog when trying to save with no GPS coords
screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.noGps.message: This observation does not have a location. You can continue waiting for a GPS signal, save the observation without a location, or enter coordinates manually

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.noGps.description: Title of dialog when trying to save with no GPS coords

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.saveA.description: Button to save regardless of GPS state

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.weakG.description: Description in dialog when trying to save with low GPS accuracy.
screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.weakG.message: GPS accuracy is low. You can continue waiting for better accuracy, save the observation with low accuracy, or enter coordinates manually

screens.ObservationEdit.SaveButton.weakG.description: Title of dialog when trying to save with low GPS accuracy.

screens.ObservationEdit.editTitle.description: screen title for edit observation screen

screens.ObservationEdit.newTitle.description: screen title for new observation screen

screens.ObservationList.observationListT.description: Title of screen with list of observations

screens.ObservationsList.ObservationList.description: Default name for an observation that does not match a preset

screens.ObservationsList.ObservationsEmp.description: Back button on observation list screen when no observations are yet recorded
Description of observation list view when the user has not yet recorded observations
screens.ObservationsList.ObservationsEmp.message: Start from map or camera view to record your first observation.

screens.ObservationsList.ObservationsEmp.description: Title of observation list view when the user has not yet recorded observations

screens.ObservationsList.error.description: message shown when there is an unexpected error when loading observations
screens.ObservationsList.error.message: Error loading observations. Try quitting and restarting Mapeo.

screens.ObservationsList.loading.description: message shown whilst observations are loading
screens.ObservationsList.loading.message: Loading… this can take a while after synchronizing with a new device

screens.ServerStatus.errorDesc.description: Description when there the Mapeo Core server crashes
screens.ServerStatus.errorDesc.message: You can try force-restarting the app, but there may be something that needs fixing. Really sorry about this, making apps is hard.

screens.ServerStatus.errorTitle.description: Title of message when there the Mapeo Core server crashes
screens.ServerStatus.errorTitle.message: Oh dear, something is broken in the Mapeo database.

screens.ServerStatus.timeoutDesc.description: Description when the server has not responded for 10 seconds
screens.ServerStatus.timeoutDesc.message: If you continue to see this message you may need to force-restart Mapeo

screens.ServerStatus.timeoutTitle.description: Title of message when the server has not responded for 10 seconds
screens.ServerStatus.timeoutTitle.message: Something is up with the Mapeo database

screens.Settings.configErrorDescription.description: Description of error dialog when there is an error importing a config file
screens.Settings.configErrorDescription.message: There was an error trying to import this config file

screens.Settings.configErrorOkButton.description: Button to dismiss error dialog when there is an error importing a config file

screens.Settings.configErrorTitle.description: Title of error dialog when there is an error importing a config file

screens.Settings.currentConfig.description: Label for name & version of current configuration

screens.Settings.projectConfig.description: Primary text for project config settings

screens.Settings.projectConfigDesc.description: Secondary text for project config settings

screens.Settings.unnamedConfig.description: Config name when do name is defined

screens.SyncModal.PeerList.errorButton.description: Button label when there is an error

screens.SyncModal.PeerList.errorClientMi.description: Short message shown under device in sync screen when it is running an incompatible (non-Mapeo) client

screens.SyncModal.PeerList.errorTheyNeed.description: Short message shown under device in sync screen when it is running an incompatible version of Mapeo

screens.SyncModal.SyncView.noWifiDesc.description: Description shown when no wifi network
screens.SyncModal.SyncView.noWifiDesc.message: Open your phone settins and connect to a WiFi network to synchronize

screens.SyncModal.SyncView.noWifiTitle.description: Title of message shown when no wifi network

screens.SyncModal.SyncView.projectKey.description: First 5 characters of project key displayed on sync screen

screens.SyncModal.SyncView.searchingDesc.description: Description shown whilst searcing for sync peers
screens.SyncModal.SyncView.searchingDesc.message: Ensure that other devices are turned on and connected to the same WiFi network

screens.SyncModal.SyncView.searchingTitl.description: Title of message shown while looking for sync peers

screens.SyncModal.errorDialogOk.description: Button to dismiss error alert about incompatible sync protocol

screens.SyncModal.errorVersionThemBadDes.description: Content of error alert when trying to sync with an incompatible older version of Mapeo
screens.SyncModal.errorVersionThemBadDes.message: The device you are trying to sync with needs to upgrade Mapeo to the latest version in order to sync with you.

screens.SyncModal.errorVersionThemBadTit.description: Title of error alert when trying to sync with an incompatible older version of Mapeo

screens.SyncModal.errorVersionUsBadDesc.description: Content of error alert when trying to sync with an incompatible newer version of Mapeo
screens.SyncModal.errorVersionUsBadDesc.message: The device you are trying to sync has a newer version of Mapeo. You need to upgrade Mapeo in order to sync with this device.

screens.SyncModal.errorVersionUsBadTitle.description: Title of error alert when trying to sync with an incompatible newer version of Mapeo

screens.UncaughtError.errorDesc.description: Description when there is an uncaught message in the app
screens.UncaughtError.errorDesc.message: Really sorry about this, something unexpected went wrong, and it's our fault not yours. Try restarting the app to see if that fixes things.

screens.UncaughtError.errorTitle.description: Title of message when there is an uncaught message in the app
